resolve

public DDNSAgent.AddressRecord resolve(NameManager manager,
                                       java.lang.String host,
                                       java.lang.String app)
Resolves a host+app name to a fully qualified address.

Parameters:
manager - The NameManager to use
host - The host name (e.g., "jz.cse461")
app - The app name (e.g., "ddns")
Returns:
An AddressRecord. The type field will be AddressType.EMPTY if resolution fails, otherwise AddressType.APP. A non-empty address record may be a negative entry - the data it contains may be null, indicating the app cannot be accessed.

                             java.lang.String app,
                             DDNSAgent.AddressRecord address)

_updateCache

private boolean _updateCache(NameManager manager,
                             java.lang.String host)
Fetches all records about named host from authoritative server and then updates the local cache.

Parameters:
manager - The NameManager to use
host - The host name
Returns:
true if records have been inserted into the name cache, false otherwise

_tryResolve

private boolean _tryResolve(NameManager manager,
                            java.lang.String host,
                            java.lang.String app,
                            DDNSAgent.AddressRecord address)

resolve

public DDNSAgent.AddressRecord resolve(java.lang.String host,
                                       java.lang.String app)
Returns address of the named host/app obtained from the local cache, if it exists. Returns null if there is no entry, or if there is a cached negative entry.

Parameters:
host - The name of the remote host
app - The canonical name of the remote app (e.g., "ping", "ddns", etc.)
Returns:
Socket connected to remote app, if possible, or null if not.
